post.content:
www.ArturoMayorga.com
This 2012, composer/producer Arturo Mayorga along with gammy award winner producer/sound engineer Corin Nelsen present Arturo’s new album Lucid Dreams

Artists in order of appearnce:
Arturo Mayorga (Piano/Keyboards)
David Cullen (Guitar) http://www.cullenguitar.com
Lew Tabackin (Flute, Saxophone) http://www.lewtabackin.com
Steve Holley (Drums, Percussion) http://www.irishusa.com/holley
Jeff Haynes (Percussion) http://jeffhaynesmusic.com
Daniele Hager (Vocals) http://www.danielehager.com
Jill Haley (Oboe, English Horn) http://www.jillhaley.com
Amy Schroeder (Violin), Keiko Tokunaga (Violin), Luke Fleming (Viola), Andrew Yee (Cello) http://attaccaquartet.com
post.title: Lucid Dreams - Teaser
